name: Gypsum Cave
overview: A three part game set in Gypsum Cave with different goals for each section, but overall find the treasures, have the adventure and get out safely. 1. Part 1 is a traditional adventure. Check the pictures for objects. The goal is to find the Jewel. 2. In part 2 you play a guessing game as to what some of the objects as as depicted in the pictures. Locations do not have descriptions. The goal of this section is to arm yourself sufficiently with knowledge, arms and magic. 3. Part 3 consists of a mapping exercise. Note direction movement in this part of the game is by numbers instead of the normal N, S, E and W, except on two occasions that will be clear. The goal is to find the passage leading out of the caves. Good luck!
